designations.source: A revised list of nationally rare bryophytes, 2010
designations.source_description: Preston, C., 2010, A revised list of nationally rare bryophytes, Field Bryology 100
designations.reporting_category: Rare and scarce species (not based on IUCN criteria)
designations.designation: Nationally Rare. Excludes Red Listed taxa
designations.designation_description: Nationally Rare - Occurring in 15 or fewer hectads in Great Britain. Excludes rare species qualifying under the main IUCN criteria.
